interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Rebound (DVD)
Review Date: 2011/07/12
Store: Abdul-Jabbar, Kareem  (Actor),     Allodi, James  (Actor)    Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama
Product Description: ['Rebound (DVD)', 'Based on a true story-He is probably the greatest basketball player who never made it to the big time. But Earl Manigault is a living legend on the streets of New York. REBOUND is his story. Shooting hoops in the playgrounds of Harlem, young Earl, nicknamed "The Goat," discovers he has a special talent for he game, a high-speed, high-flying agility that soon makes him a champion slam-dunker. As a high school star he reaches the top by pitting himself against future greats like Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, but staying at the top proves harder. Seduced by his friends into an easy lifestyle of parties and drug abuse, earl soon finds himself slipping from the top-and his battles are just beginning. Confronted by a team that consists of harsher realities-a brutal coach, a pregnant girlfriend, and a drug habit that won\'t let go-"The Goat" is about to discover that it will take all his energy and talent if he is to break free and REBOUND.', ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama, African American Cinema', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Steward, Kevin, Ralph, Michael, Whitaker, Forest, Tunie, Tamara, Jones, James Earl, Calhoun, Monica, Devine, Loretta, Cheadle, Don, Abdul-Jabbar, Kareem, Cox, Ronny, Mitchell, Daryl, Williams, Cress, Cheadle, Colin, Allodi, James, Turman, Glynn, Hearn, Chick, Williams III, Clarence, Parker, Nicole Ari, Beach, MichaelSteward, Kevin, Ralph, Michael, Whitaker, Forest, Tunie, Tamara, Jones, James Earl, Calhoun, Monica, Devine, Loretta, Cheadle, Don, Abdul-Jabbar, Kareem, Cox, Ronny, Mitchell, Daryl, Williams, Cress, Cheadle, Colin, Allodi, James, Turman, Glynn, Hearn, Chick, Williams III, Clar…   See more', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 56 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.75 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2221114', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 56 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 21, 2005', 'Actors': 'Abdul-Jabbar, Kareem, Allodi, James, Beach, Michael, Calhoun, Monica, Cheadle, Colin', 'Studio': 'HBO Studios', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: If you have not seen this movie than please buy it! This is a great movie, true story and it will have you thinking about how easy it is for your life to take a turn for the worst at a blink of an eye. All star cast, heart felt movie. One of my favorites.
Review Title: 'love and basketball"
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Favorite Genre:** Prefers drama films, particularly those that depict true stories and resonate emotionally.
- **Themes of Interest:** Enjoys narratives that highlight personal struggles, resilience, and the harsh realities of life, often with a focus on sports and African American culture.
- **Engagement Style:** Expresses deep appreciation for films that inspire reflection on life choices and the consequences of actions. 
- **Rating Trend:** Highly rates films, indicating a tendency to engage positively with content that aligns with personal values and experiences.
- **Movie Characteristics:** Favors films with compelling casts and heartfelt storytelling, suggesting a preference for quality production and strong performances.

Overall, this user likely seeks out films that provoke thought and evoke strong emotional responses, valuing both substance and entertainment in their viewing choices.
